metadata.title: CVE-2023-39331 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A previously disclosed vulnerability (CVE-2023-30584) was patchedinsufficiently in commit 205f1e6. The new path traversal vulnerabilityarises because the implementation does not protect itself against theapplication overwriting built-in utility functions with user-definedimplementations. Please note that at the time this CVE was issued, thepermission model is an experimental feature of Node.js.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
